titles.title: A bill to provide for the correction of a certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System map.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 4/26/2005--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to make any corrections to the map subtitled "Four Mile Hill Unit TX-16P, North Padre Island Unit T10/T10P" (one in a set of maps of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System) that are necessary to ensure that it is consistent with the map entitled "Corrections to Coastal Barrier Resources System Map Unit T-10", dated June_____, 2004.
